newsitem.title: VIETNAM: Vietnam to sell 50 bln dong T-notes on Wednesday.
newsitem.headline: Vietnam to sell 50 bln dong T-notes on Wednesday.

text.p: Vietnam will auction 50 billion dong ($4.45 million) worth of one-year Treasury notes on Wednesday, an official at the State Bank of Vietnam said on Tuesday.
A target interest rate was set at the last sale, but the official said no such measure was being planned this time.
There have been two treasury paper sales so far this year, through which a total of 60 billion dong worth of Treasury stock has been issued.
At last week's auction, on February 26, the central bank issued 50 billion dong worth of one-year notes to domestic institutions at an annual coupon of 11.5 percent.
